ai-patthana21.35:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, namely, discussing the extent of the Teaching,
ai-patthana21.35:0.3_0: Telling for oneself is a cause of reason.
ai-patthana21.35:1.1_0: One has not cause or condition for the sake of reciting the Dhamma, nor for the support of the Dhamma,
ai-patthana21.35:1.1_1: There is a reward for nine objects, and for three days before you have come to an end.
ai-patthana21.35:2.1_0: not by means of principles or by means of the Dhamma, or by the object of the Dhamma,
ai-patthana21.35:2.1_1: There is a reward for nine objects, and for three days before you have come to an end.
